Buff_Matrix_SSR42_level1_FireUP_des: Flowing Fire: Increase final damage by ???%, and increase crit damage by an additional ???% within ??? seconds of landing a critical hit. For every 3 charged attacks that hit a target, restore 1 dodge attempt. Cooldown: 2 seconds.

Buff_SnipeFire_SSR_Level0_Crit_des: Increase Clover Cross' final crit rate by ???% for ??? seconds, stacking up to 3 times. After the crit rate exceeds 100%, 50% of the extra amount will be converted into crit damage, up to 7.5%.
Buff_SnipeFire_SSR_Level0_Resonance_des: Flame Reaction: Increase flame ATK by 20% and flame resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Does not stack with Flame Resonance effects.
Buff_SnipeFire_SSR_Level0_des:
Flame Reaction: Increase flame ATK by 20% and flame resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Does not stack with Flame Resonance effects.
Tranquil Heart: Using discharge/skills/charged attacks/dodging with Clover Cross increases Clover Cross' final crit rate by 5% for 15 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. After the crit rate exceeds 100%, 50% of the extra amount will be converted into crit damage, up to 7.5%.
Buff_SnipeFire_SSR_Level1_des:
Hitting a target 2 times with Cross Snipe creates an optical space for 12 seconds at the target location. After enemies in the optical space are inflicted with burn, burn damage will be triggered an additional 2 times. When an enemy unit leaves the optical space, their speed is reduced by 80% for 2.5 seconds. Cooldown: 12 seconds.
Targets of Cross Snipe will be terrified (speed is slowed by 80%) for 1.5 seconds. Cooldown: 4 seconds.
Buff_SnipeFire_SSR_Level3_Crit_des: Increase Clover Cross' final crit rate by ???% for ??? seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If the crit rate exceeds 100% in this way, 50% of the extra amount will be converted into crit damage, up to 13.5%.
Buff_SnipeFire_SSR_Level3_des:
Recover HP equal to 50% of the damage dealt every time Cross Snipe lands a critical hit (not exceeding 15% of own Max HP) and 50 weapon charge.
Each stack of Tranquil Heart increases final crit rate to 9%, up to 27%, and converts up to 13.5% of crit damage.
Buff_SnipeFire_SSR_Level5_des:
Ruthless Bomb Enhancement: While in the Burn Enhancement state, burn damage dealt to targets is increased by 30%.
Deceitful Bomb Enhancement: Gas explosion damage ignores 30% of the target's flame resistance.
Buff_SnipeFire_SSR_Level6_des: Increase damage dealt by Cross Snipe by an additional 20%.
GA_FPlayerSnipeChangeSkill_Success_des: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another removes all debuffs from the wielder and throws an incendiary bomb that can be detonated by firing at it, dealing damage up to ???% of ATK + ??? and strongly suspending them. Damage immunity lasts 2.6 seconds when the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).
GA_FPlayerSnipeEvade_EvadeAttack_des:
Leap backward and throw 1 grenade forward, which detonates upon hitting the ground, dealing damage up to ???% of ATK + ??? to targets and suspending them in the air.
Passive: Tapping normal attack after using Twilight Arc instantly fires a fully charged Cross Snipe.
GA_FPlayerSnipeEvade_Evade_des: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for 0.5 seconds.
GA_FPlayerSnipeMelee_AirAttack_des:
While airborne, use normal attack to attack 3 times in a row in the air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and launch the target.
GA_FPlayerSnipeMelee_Branch_des: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to fire a laser projectile that explodes upon hitting the target, dealing damage up to ???% of ATK + ??? to the target within range and suspending them.
GA_FPlayerSnipeMelee_Melee_des:
While on the ground, attack 3 times in a row with the sniper rifle.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knock the target back.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and launch the target.
GA_FPlayerSnipeMelee_PowerAttack_des:
Tap and hold normal attack to charge, dealing basic damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???. After charging, deal damage up to ???% of ATK + ???. Headshots and hitting enemy weak points deal double damage and launch the target (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).
Passive: Recover 300 weapon charge when Cross Snipe hits a burning target or lands a critical hit. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
Passive: Speed is increased by 30% for 3 seconds after using Cross Snipe.
GA_FPlayerSnipeSkill_Skill_name:
Switch modules to change the effects of Cross Snipe and Twilight Arc. Cross Snipe can be used up to 8 times. Skill cooldown: 14 seconds.
 Ruthless Bomb: The effect of Cross Snipe becomes a flame explosion that deals basic damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? within an area. After charging, deal damage up to ???% of ATK + ???. Upon hitting targets that are not burning, inflict them with Cross Burn, which deals damage equal to 120% of ATK every second for 13 seconds. Upon hitting burning targets, inflict them with Cross Burn, and enter Burn Enhancement for 20 seconds, which increases burn damage on targets by 20%. When using Twilight Arc, you now throw 3 grenades instead.
 Deceitful Bomb: Changes the effects of Cross Snipe into a ranged Gas attack that deals basic damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? upon hit. After charging, deal up to ???% of ATK + ???. Targets in the Gas will be slowed. The slow effect becomes stronger over time, and the Gas lasts 7 seconds. Twilight Arc can detonate the Gas (the longer the charge, the greater the Gas explosion damage), dealing explosion damage up to ???% of ATK + ??? (this is deemed as triggering Cross Snipe 1 time) and reducing the target's flame resistance by 10% for 10 seconds.
 
Passive: After confirming the module, you will get a number of Optical Enhancement uses. Optical Enhancement: Reduces the charging time of Cross Snipe by 30%, becoming immune to damage while charging. Recover 1 dodge attempt (up to 4 dodge attempts) every 2 dodges.
Passive: While the Deceitful Bomb Module is in effect, Cross Snipe has a chance of reducing the cooldown of other flame weapon skills by 0.7 seconds after hitting a target.
GE_SnipePowerAttack_DamageUP_Level6_30_d: Increase the damage dealt by the next Cross Snipe by an additional 30%.
GE_SnipePowerAttack_FireDamageUP1_Level5: Increase your burn damage dealt by 30% for 20 seconds.
GE_SnipePowerAttack_FireDamageUP1_des: Increase your burn damage dealt by 20% for 20 seconds.
GE_SnipeSkill_BoomCount_Display_des: Can be used up to 8 times. Each use of Cross Snipe reduces the uses by 1.
MatrixSuit_SSR21_des1: Increase final damage by 5%/6%/7%/8% and final crit rate by 2.5%/2.5%/3%/3% for 25 seconds when hitting a target with a flame weapon, stacking up to 2 times. Only the effect of the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.
MatrixSuit_SSR21_des2: When equipping 2 or more flame weapons, gain the Flowing Fire effect, which increases final damage by 11%/13%/15%/17%, and increases crit damage by an additional 22%/24%/26%/28% within 25 seconds of landing a critical hit. For every 3 charged attacks that hit the target, restore 1 dodge attempt. Cooldown: 2 seconds. Only the effect of the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.
Nitai_annabeila_SSR_desc: Unlock Clover Cross to venture into the Tower of Fantasy world as Annabella, the weapon's Simulacrum.
Snipe_fire_reason_1: The two-set bonus increases DPS by increasing final damage and crit rate. The four-set bonus further increases final damage and crit rate, and grants dodge attempts.
Snipe_fire_reason_2: The three-set bonus increases ATK and benefits the attack range of Clover Cross.
breakfate_evade:
Leap backward and throw 1 grenade forward which detonates upon hitting the ground, dealing damage up to ???% of ATK + ??? to targets and suspending them in the air.
Passive: Tapping normal attack after using Twilight Arc can instantly unleash Cross Snipe (not fully charged).
breakfate_powerattack:
Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack, dealing basic damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???. After charging, deal damage up to ???% of ATK + ???. Deal double damage for a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and launch the target (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).
Passive: Speed is increased by 30% for 3 seconds after using Cross Snipe.
breakfate_upgrade:
Passive 1: Hitting the target 2 times with Cross Snipe creates an optical space that lasts for 12 seconds at the target location. After enemies in the optical space are inflicted with burn, and burn damage will be triggered an additional 2 times.

Passive 2: Recover 50 weapon charge whenever Cross Snipe lands a critical hit.
Each stack of Tranquil Heart increases final crit rate to 9%, up to 27% in total, and converts up to 13.5% of crit damage.

choose_matrix_SSR21_des: A box containing all the Annabella Matrices.
matrix_SSR21_2_1: It easily becomes unresponsive without a command.
matrix_SSR21_3_1: â€”One of the last words you would use to describe a vampire.
matrix_SSR21_4_1: There will always be people who are only willing to act within their comfort zone.
operate_sysz_desc: Instructions for Clover Cross. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.
snipe_fire_ssr_1: The official operation team of a VR multiplayer online shooting game that is incredibly popular in Mirroria specially designed this exclusive gun for their top player from a certain season. The customized physical model of the gun was also sent to the champion, but nobody realized it could be used just like in the game...
